---
title: "gameweeks"
---

The **gameweeks** dataset contains data for each of the gameweeks in the [fantasy.premierleague.com](http://fantasy.premierleague.com) game.  It is likely that gameweeks change as fixtures are cancelled and moved. 

Once the package has been loaded, to access the dataset:
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(fantasysocceR)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data(gameweeks)
```

The dataframe has dimensions `r dim(gameweeks)[1]` rows and `r dim(gameweeks)[2]` columns.
```{r}
str(gameweeks)
```
